task.title: Configuring the key repository by using the
task.shortdesc: System administrators and messaging administrators can configure the key repository by using the MQ Connectivity page in the .

context.p: You can configure the key repository by using the .

step.cmd: Go to the MQ Connectivity page in one of the following ways:

choices.choice: From the Home tab, click MQ Connectivity in the Configure IBM Watson IoT Platform - Message Gateway to accept connections pane.
From the Messaging menu, click MQ Connectivity

step.cmd: From the SSL Key Repository pane, choose an action:

choices.choice:
To upload new SSL repository files, click Upload.
This option is available only if no SSL repository files are already uploaded.

To download the repository files, click Download for each file you want to download.
This option is available only if SSL repository files are already uploaded.

To delete the SSL repository files, click Delete.
This option is available only if SSL repository files are already uploaded.
